nodes.text: Chagri was the native language of the sentient Chagrian species. A pleasant tongue, it was rarely heard outside of the Chagrian homeworld of Champala as Chagrians that traveled offworld learned Galactic Basic Standard with ease.

Chagri was mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2016 Star Wars Roleplaying supplement Lead by Example, which was published by Fantasy Flight Games. The language originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the Alien Anthology, a 2001 roleplaying supplement for Wizards of the Coast's Star Wars Roleplaying Game.
